title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Get ready for a fun-filled family game night with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Board Game! This exciting game is perfect for kids ages 8 and up, pitting kids against parents in a battle of wits and words.

With two decks of cards featuring familiar words for kids and over 1,000 varied words for adults, the gameplay is fast-paced and engaging. Try to get your teammates to guess the word without saying the forbidden words, or risk giving the opposing team a point.

Included in the game are two decks of cards, a squeaker for added fun, and a one-minute timer to keep the game moving. The objective is simple: earn the most points by correctly guessing words and avoiding the forbidden ones.

Don't miss out on this exciting game night experience from Hasbro Gaming! Gather the family and see who will come out on top in the Taboo Kids vs. Parents Board Game.

Get ready for a hilarious showdown with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! Perfect for players ages 8 and up, this fast-paced game pits kids against parents in a race to guess words without saying the forbidden ones. 

With over 1,000 guess words and 260 cards included, the excitement never ends. The game features two decks - one for kids with familiar words and one for adults with varied options. Plus, with a squeaker and a one-minute timer, the fun never stops. 

Gather your family around for a night of laughter and friendly competition. Can you outsmart the other team and earn the most points to win? Find out with Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game!

With over 1,000 guess words and varying forbidden words, there's plenty of fun and challenge to keep everyone entertained. The winning condition is simple - have the most points at the end of the game!

Don't miss out on the fun - bring the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game to your next game night and enjoy hours of laughter and friendly competition with your loved ones. Get yours today and let the games begin!
